cells.data:
-- removeFile :: FilePath -> Either String String
on removeFile(fp)
    set e to reference
    set {bln, obj} to current application's NSFileManager's Â¬
        defaultManager's removeItemAtPath:(fp) |error|:(e)
    if bln then
        |Right|("Removed: " & fp)
    else
        |Left|(obj's localizedDescription as string)
    end if
end removeFile
